welcome: I'm a full-stack developer specialized in Javascript and in React. I love creating interactive and dynamic web and mobile applications. My specialities includes the fields of associations, education, and social matters, but I am open to any proposal.

projects.title: Projects:
projects.intro: Here are some of my recent projects:

aeshManager.shortDescription: Aesh Manager is a Saas allowing the creation of cross-schedules for AESH and Children
aeshManager.description: AeshManager is an online solution designed for school directors and education managers. In just a few clicks, you can assign AESH to students and vice versa, calculate their actual hours as well as the difference with their contracts or granted hours.

ColoCrew.shortDescription: ColoCrew is a web and mobile application that connects camp directors and animators directly.
ColoCrew.description: ColoCrew facilitates recruitment for holiday camps, leisure activities, after-school programs, etc. It allows recruiters or candidates to create their profile, their camp, and to specifically select profiles or camps that match their criteria.
